name: Math Coin
description: What is the project about? A meme coin called MATH.Why a meme coin? Because they understood that the numbers were yearning for a break from their strictly structured existence. What makes your project unique? A group of mathematicians, after enjoying a hearty laugh at this absurdity, came up with a creative solution: A meme coin called MATH. History of your project. Once upon a time, in a universe ruled by logic and mathematical theorems, the world began to notice an oddity. Numerals, which were known for their rigidity and precision, started behaving erratically. '2+2=4' sometimes equaled 5, and a triangle's angles occasionally summed up to more than 180 degrees! This rebellion didn't go unnoticed. A group of mathematicians, after enjoying a hearty laugh at this absurdity, came up with a creative solution: A meme coin called MATH.
